HTML.name: HTML5
HTML.desc: First language which I've started to learn I've created thousands of static web pages which looked awful.

CSS.name: CSS3
CSS.desc: After a while of learing HTML I've noticed that I'd like to make my pages look prettier, I've learned CSS, and then went ahead and learned some CSS preprocessors and libraries

Tailwind/Bootstrap/Vuetify.name: Tailwind/Bootstrap/Vuetify
Tailwind/Bootstrap/Vuetify.desc: Styling libraries which I mainly use in my projects - I'm in love with Tailwind but shhh...

SCSS.name: SCSS
SCSS.desc: Preprocessor which I've learned to write CSS faster.

JS.name: JavaScript
JS.desc: The mother of Web Development, I totally love it and made a lot of Vanilla JS apps to learn WebDev or cheat in some WebGames, but don't tell anybody.

VUE.name: Vue3
VUE.desc: First JS framwork which I've decided to learn, the decision of choosing between vue/react or angular was spontanious and at this moment I'm happy that I've choosen Vue. Btw. porfolio is writted in Vue as well.

Angular.name: Angular
Angular.desc: Next JS framwork which I've been learning for a while in school, I'm not strong in it but with the help of docs I'm sure I'd create some small apps.

PHP.name: PHP7
PHP.desc: First back-end language which I've learned in school an by myself even though it is believied that it's old-modern I liked it and feel quite strong.

SQL.name: SQL
SQL.desc: Query langugage which I've learned in school, I really like it and feel good.

Laravel.name: Laravel
Laravel.desc: First PHP framework which I've decided to learn, I've choosed it over Symphony becouse I've heared it's easier to learn, but still give a lot of powerfull features. Most of my APIs are written in Laravel.

NodeJS.name: NodeJS
NodeJS.desc: JS as a back-end, when I've heared of that idea I thought it could be something for me, but I didn't felt this technology and stopped learning. Anyway I'd still like to go back and try again. With the help of docs I think that i could do some small REST APIs with node.

Insomnia/Postman.name: Insomnia/Postman
Insomnia/Postman.desc: I used both of them to test my APIs. First I've only used Postman but after a while I started to use Insomnia and I really liked it.

Github/Heroku.name: Github/Heroku
Github/Heroku.desc: I am using both of them to store and serve my projects. I am familliar to basic Git commands.

C#/Python.name: C#/Python
C#/Python.desc: Both of these languages were taught in school, I know how to write basic algorythms, but I'm not into those technologies.

PhotoShop.name: PhotoShop
PhotoShop.desc: I have some basic skills in PhotoShop

Pizzeria Client View.name: Pizzeria Client View
Pizzeria Client View.desc: Pizzeria web-page based on admin panel descipted below. User is allowed to set orders through this webpage.

Pizzeria Admin Panel.name: Pizzeria Admin Panel
Pizzeria Admin Panel.desc: On of my biggest project which is Admin Panel for a restaurant, it allows an user for example to make CRUD operations on products/waiters, change the resturant view and moreo thers features. Front view is written in VUE and API in Laravel.

MergeIT.name: MergeIT
MergeIT.desc: Business card page made for it company.

WeatherApp.name: WeatherApp
WeatherApp.desc: What a portfolio would it be without an weather app ? :D I've created it based on some youtube tutorial, but made a lot of changes and added own features so I've decided to placed it in projects page.

Dance Contest WebPage.name: Dance Contest WebPage
Dance Contest WebPage.desc: Web-page with custom admin panel which is used for selling tickets for and International Dancing Contest. It is integrated with Przelewy24 payment system. It is currently in production so I can't show the link. I can show the work at the interview if there would a need.

Cleaning company admin panel.name: Cleaning company admin panel
Cleaning company admin panel.desc: Custom admin panel which is used for managing cleaning orders.  It is currently in production so I can't show the link. I can show the work at the interview if there would a need.

Adventure park web-page.name: Adventure park web-page
Adventure park web-page.desc: Business card page made for local adventure park.
